### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron ore mine at position(-15, -50)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=-15.0, y=-50.0) and a chest at position(x=-16.5, y=-49.5)

### Iron plate factory at position(40, -82)
Consists of following entities
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-82.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-83.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=42.0, y=-81.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=45.0, y=-80.0) 
-  Furnace (position x=40.0, y=-79.0) 
-  Chests at positions (x=40.5, y=-80.5), (x=43.5, y=-81.5)

### Electricity generator at position(10.5, 10.5)
Consists of steam engine (position x=10.5, y=10.5), boiler (position x=-6.0, y=24.5) and offshore pump (position x=-9.5, y=24.5)

### Lab at unknown position
Consists of lab with input {'automation-science-pack': 100}

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when drill or boiler is out of fuel
-  Ensure that the drill or boiler has sufficient fuel before starting operations
-  Monitor the fuel levels of drills and boilers regularly to avoid out of fuel errors
### Errors when furnace has no ingredients to smelt
-  Ensure that the furnace has the required ingredients to smelt before starting operations
-  Monitor the ingredient levels of furnaces regularly to avoid no ingredients to smelt errors
### Errors when generator has no input liquid or no fluid present in connections
-  Ensure that the generator has the required input liquid and fluid connections before starting operations
-  Monitor the fluid levels and connections of generators regularly to avoid no input liquid or no fluid present in connections errors
